metadata.title: CVE-2023-52678 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdkfd: Confirm list is non-empty before utilizing list_first_entry inkfd_topology.c Before using list_first_entry, make sure to check that listis not empty, if list is empty return -ENODATA. Fixes the below:drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../amdkfd/kfd_topology.c:1347kfd_create_indirect_link_prop() warn: can 'gpu_link' even be NULL?drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../amdkfd/kfd_topology.c:1428kfd_add_peer_prop() warn: can 'iolink1' even be NULL?drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../amdkfd/kfd_topology.c:1433kfd_add_peer_prop() warn: can 'iolink2' even be NULL?

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
